name: Star Climber
description:
IMPORTANT: PLAY THE GAME IN 50% WINDOW SIZE, THIS WILL BE FIXED TOMORROW.

Enjoy this little platformer game! The project was made in 4 days for the 6th edition of ZenoJam.

All feedback is welcome, you can use the rating system or the comment section to help me improve my future games.

This game will be ported to mobile after the Jam ends

Known Issues
  • Tutorial transition: pillars not being consistent due to a last minute fix.
  • 1-way platforms feeling a bit glitchy
  • Enemies spawning inside walls in certain levels
  • Music does not loop (?)
Controls Game:
  • [A D] or [Arrow Keys] to move
  • [Space] to Jump
  • [Esc] to return to the Main Menu
  • [R] to retry

Menus:
  • [Vertical arrow keys] to select
  • [Space] to confirm
  • [Horizontal arrow arrows] to select audio in the settings tab
 Credits

Art and programming by @ItsAssasin
Music by @Patrick de Arteaga https://patrickdearteaga.com/es/index-es/
